QuestData.Title: The Toll of the Road
QuestData.Description: This vessel appears to be brimming with anima. It is certainly tolls collected from denizens traveling by this crossroads. I am sure with all that is going on, Mistress Mihaela in Darkhaven would appreciate these tolls brought to her to cover the Village Ward's obligations.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Mistress Mihaela in Darkhaven.
